radiographic_examinations.findings: A well-defined, low-density lesion on the ventral surface of the left tongue with little surrounding enhancement; soft-tissue densities within both valleculae interpreted as hyperplastic lingual tonsils; multiple bilateral enlarged cervical lymph nodes, up to 2.3 cm in the greatest dimension; mild mucosal thickening in the alveolar recesses of the maxillary sinuses.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The lesion slightly increased in size.
